text: A mutt is a mongrel (a dog of unknown ancestry). Mutt may also refer to: ==People== ===Nickname=== * Larry Black (1951-2006), American sprinter * Mutt Carey (1886–1948), New Orleans jazz trumpeter * Emanuel J. "Mutt" Evans (1907–1997), American businessman and first Jewish mayor of Durham, North Carolina * Robert John "Mutt" Lange (born 1948), music producer * Andrew Shaw (ice hockey) (born 1991), Canadian National Hockey League player * Mutt Summers (1904–1954), chief test pilot at Vickers-Armstrongs and Supermarine * Mutt Williams (baseball) (1892–1962), Major League Baseball pitcher * Mutt Wilson (1896–1962), Major League Baseball pitcher ===Other=== * codename of Allied double agent John "Helge" Moe during World War II - see Mutt and Jeff (spies) * Mihkel Mutt (born 1953), Estonian writer and journalist ==Arts and entertainment== * A. Mutt, a character in the Mutt and Jeff comic * Mutts, a daily comic-strip by Patrick McDonnell * Mutt (G.I. Joe), a fictional character in the G.I. Joe universe * Mutt Williams, Indiana Jones' son in Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull, played by Shia LaBeouf * Mutt, a Muttaburrasaurus in The Land Before Time * Mutt (album), a 2004 album by roots-music group Lost Dogs * Mutt (song), a 1999 song from Blink-182's Enema of the State album * Mutts, genetically-engineered mutant species in the fictional world of The Hunger Games * Mutts (band), a rock band from Chicago ==Other uses== * Mutt, Virginia, an unincorporated community * M151, a nickname based on Military Utility Tactical Truck * Mutt (email client), a terminal-based e-mail client for Unix-like systems * Mutt (hinduism), alternate spelling for Matha, a Hindu or Jain religious establishment * MutT, alternate name for 8-oxo-dGTP diphosphatase, an enzyme * Matt (disambiguation) Category:Lists of people by nickname
title: Mutt
